title: New Elise Skin???
body:
Hi, I play alot of {{champion:60}} and was wondering If riot could release a new skin for her. She only has two and seems to be missing out on some love in the skin department :)   Maybe post some ideas on which set of skins she could be fitted to I think she would fit the Marauder set or Guardian Of the sands.

feel free to post comments on which skin set she should be in.[](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Commando#Related_Themes_by_Identical_Names.2C_Lore.2C_and_Reference)

replies.body: Well, she technically has three skins, one of which is currently unavailable. Also, her most recent skin came out not too long ago, so Riot probably isn't looking to make a skin for her at the moment.

Lets not forget what our brother {{champion:154}} Zac experienced. Was basically given a 1 colour chroma pack on release, and then did not receive another skin for over **2 years**. 

Elise mains should consider themselves lucky.
imagine a zac skin that made him into like gravel, like malphite
I will agree on Zac yes he does need more skins its easy just put some shoulderpads on him make him blue "Vwala" Elemental ZAC!!!
Mhmm. Many champions haven't had a skin a lot longer than Elise, so unfortunately for all the Elise mains out there they may have to wait a while!
Great! the long wait begins then.... :(
